actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To continue until January 1, 1994, the existing suspensions of duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1993, the existing suspension of duties on: (1) o-benzyl-p-chlorophenol; (2) 6-amino-1-naphthol-3-sulfonic acid; (3) carbodiimides; (4) diphenyl guanidine/di-o-tolylguanidine; and (5) dichlorohexylbenzothiazylsulfenamide.

titles.title: To continue until January 1, 1994, the existing suspensions of duty on certain chemicals.
